page.title: 18ROTH.TWIN TOWN TO BRENTWOOD
page.content:
In August 1978 Brentwood twinned with the town of{Roth}in Bavaria, West Germany. The first official visit to Roth took place in May 1979 when members of The Town Planning Association arranged for organisations and clubs to make exchanges with families in Germany.
A talented Youth Band from Roth came to perform in Brentwood on May 25th 1985. During this summer Scout and Guide groups and the Athletic Club will go to Roth. These and other exchanges have fostered close links between the two communities.
It has not affected everyone. In a survey of 100 people only 42 knew about the Town-twinning programme with Roth.
